source_sentence: 第三常住正念下七頌彼果勝中。
translation: In the third, he always abides in right mindfulness and seven verses below that, he praises the superiority of those fruits.
The first verse summarizes the superiority of merit.
The next verse and a half verse praise the superiority of cultivation.
The next half of the verse praises the superiority of teaching sentient beings.
The next four verses give rise to the superiority of worldly cognition.
The next seven verses praise the fruit of the ground.
The first three are subtle and gentle.
The next three and a half verses are on gathering rewards.
The next half is the knowledge of vows.

source_sentence: 後一結說究竟難勝地竟。
translation: The last one concludes by explaining the ultimate difficulty in overcoming the ground.

source_sentence: 華嚴經探玄記卷第十二
translation: Huayan jing探玄記華嚴經探玄記卷第十二
